Service Details: - Works as a Sponsorship Agreement Holder (SAH) with Citizenship and Immigration Canada (CIC) to sponsor refugee families- Members of this SAH include the First United Church, Rutland United Church, Winfield United Church and St. Paul's United Church- Other groups involved in sponsoring refugees are the Lutheran Anglican Refugee Committee, the Kelowna Gospel Fellowship, the Islamic Centre of Kelowna (Kelowna Masjid), the Mission Creek Alliance Church, St. Charles Garnier Church, St. Pius X Church, and the West Kelowna Initiative for Refugee Settlement
